front.title: ISO/IEC/IEEE Information technology--Telecommunications and information exchange between systems--Local and metropolitan area networks--Specific requirements -- Part 1Q: Bridges and bridged networks AMENDMENT 2: Application virtual local area network (VLAN) type, length, value (TLV)

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Enhancements to the set of TLVs used by the Data Center Bridging eXchange protocol (DCBX) for the purpose of simplifying the management of networks utilizing Data Center Bridging (DCB) features are defined in this amendment to IEEE Std 802.1Q-2014.
